Acid Flask.name: Acid Flask
Acid Flask.description: A flask filled with the concentrate of a Lindwurm's acidic blood. It is highly corrosive to many materials and burns through armor quickly. Can be thrown at short ranges.

Flash Pot.name: Flash Pot
Flash Pot.description: A throwable pot filled with mysterious powders that react violently on impact to create a bright flash and loud bang. Will daze anyone close by.

Fire Pot.name: Fire Pot
Fire Pot.description: A pot filled with highly flammable liquid that will set an area ablaze with fire when thrown.

Flask of Blessed Water.name: Flask of Blessed Water
Flask of Blessed Water.description: A flask filled with water blessed by a man of the gods. Can be thrown at short ranges.

Reinforced Throwing Net.name: Reinforced Throwing Net
Reinforced Throwing Net.description: A net used to throw over a target in order to hamper their ability to move and defend themself effectively. Reinforced with gossamer taken from a webknecht, it is even harder to break free from.

Smoke Pot.name: Smoke Pot
Smoke Pot.description: A small pot that quickly creates a dense smoke cloud when broken on the ground. Useful for covering movement.

Throwing Net.name: Throwing Net
Throwing Net.description: A net used to throw over a target in order to hamper their ability to move and defend themself effectively.
